lyrics:
3 contributorslove train lyricsi see people gettin mad on cnn

lets take a ride

and take a ride
lets take a ride on the love train
unwind well be chuga luggin all the way
lets roll like the stones playin all day hey
lets take a ride
lets take a ride on a love train

without jordan on the team
and the high price of gasoline

but if your anything like me
well then i bet you really need
you might also liketo take a ride
lets take a ride on the love train
unwind well be chuga luggin all the way
lets roll like the stones playin all day hey
lets take a ride
lets take a ride on a love trainembed
